shortdesc.i: This event is fired by the system. If you want to listen to the event you can do so using the document.addEventListener function and remove the listener using the document.removeEventListener function. The languagechanged event is triggered whenever the language setting of the device is changed.

dd.p: The callback function that will be triggered on the languagechange event.
The new language setting of the device. Its format conforms to BCP47.

p.pre:
<script type="text/javascript">

function onLanguageChange(newLanguage) {
    alert("The laguage has changed to " + newLanguage);
}

document.addEventListener("languagechanged", onLanguageChange);

</script>
